change_history.change: Changed the visuals for the [X] ability.

The strength of Dark Blade's Upgrading was nerfed.
10% -> 8% Damage Boost.

The Dark Blade was reworked.
Added new model.
Increased the damage and speed of [X] Dark Air Slash V2 when held.
Improved the visual effects on the Dark Blade's abilities.
Reduced end-lag on the [Z] One Thousand Slices ability.

The Dark Blade was re-imagined:
New model.
New and faster combat animations.
Alternative abilities (V2-exclusive):
Holding the [Z] One Thousand Slices ability for at least 0.25s will move the player forward.
The [X] Dark Air Slash ability can be charged for up to 0.4s for a slightly faster attack, and to break Instinct.
The Dark Blade was slightly buffed.
The Dark Blade's rarity was changed to Mythical.

The Dark Blade was slightly nerfed.
The [Z] One Thousand Slices + [X] Dark Air Slash combo is no longer inescapable.
The Dark Blade was released as a Legendary sword.
Buddha V1 received a slightly higher Air Jump (around 1.5x) compared to untransformed.
Awakened Buddha's abilities damage were buffed.

While transformed, the damage of swords' M1 was nerfed.
Human: Buddha users now deal 27.5% decreased M1 damage, only in PvP.

Control was buffed.
[Z] Control Area now lasts longer.
Lowered cooldown on [X] Levitate and [F] Teleport.
Increased the damage of [V] Gamma Rush, and it no longer shrinks after catching a player, and doesn't disappear after the move.

Control was buffed.
Increased the damage of [X] Levitate

Control was buffed.
Increased the stun on [C] Echo Knife.
Slightly increased damage on [V] Gamma Rush.

Control was buffed.
Decreased the end-lag on [C] Echo Knife.

Jitte's moves were revamped.
[Z] Smoke Barrage was renamed to [Z] Smoke Leopard.

Chop was reworked and renamed to Blade.
Added a [TAP] ability.
[Z] Tackle was renamed to [Z] Razor Cyclone.
[X] Dance was renamed to [X] Blade Dance.
[C] Party was renamed to [C] Saw Shredder.
[F] Helicopter was renamed to [F] Turbine Flight.
The pull-back hitbox of [X] Dragon Hurricane was nerfed.
Instinct dodges no longer drain when moving out of the [X] move.
The pull-back hitbox of [X] Dragon Hurricane was slightly nerfed.

The True Triple Katana's model was revamped.
Old True Triple Katana's Icon
The True Triple Katana's moves were revamped.

The True Triple Katana was changed:
The range on [Z] was reduced by ~15%.
The stun on [Z] was reduced by 0.2 seconds.
The damage on [X] was reduced.
The tornado hitbox on [X] was fixed and reduced (it now acted more like a cone rather than a big sphere). The end delay was also increased by 0.1s.
The True Triple Katana was released.
The Triple Dark Blade's model and skills were revamped.
Fixed Slayer Skin not applying on abilities.
Added the Triple Dark Blade's Upgrading.
The Triple Dark Blade has been nerfed.
The Triple Dark Blade was silently added into the game.

Buffed Hallow Scythe's speed and damage.
[X] move now breaks Instinct.

The effect of Hallow Scythe's Upgrading was nerfed.
10% -> 8% Damage Boost
Cursed Dual Katana's model was reworked.
[X] Slayer of Goliath received a small visual change altering the spinning X that appears on the target's screen.
Shisui was remodeled and renamed to Shizu.
The Spikey Trident's moves were revamped.
Saddi was remodeled and renamed to Saishi.
Added burn damage to [Z] Demon Slayer.
Rengoku's passive idle stance was revamped.
The model of Pole (2nd Form) was revamped.
The moves of Pole (2nd Form) were reworked.
Wando was remodeled and renamed to Oroshi.

Wando was reworked.
[X] Scatter Shot was renamed to [X] Dragon Gust.

Koko was buffed.
New: [X] Injection Shot can hit anywhere inside the user's Control Area.
The [Z] and [X] startup animations were changed.
Made Bisento a bit bigger visually.
Jitte was reworked and renamed to Flail.

Jitte's moves were revamped.
[Z] Smoke Barrage was renamed to [Z] Smoke Leopard.
Gravity Cane was renamed to Gravity Blade and received a visual rework.

Gravity Cane's moves were reworked.
[Z] Gravity Push was renamed to [Z] Dimensional Grasp.
[X] Meteor Barrage was renamed to [X] Lunar Blitz.

Dragon Trident was nerfed.
[X] Water Dragon Shower AoE was greatly reduced.

Dragon Trident's moves were reworked.
[X] Water Dragon Prison was renamed to [X] Water Dragon Shower.
Old [Z] Sea Dragon FuryOld [X] Water Dragon Prison
The Katana's slash animation was reworked.
The Cutlass's slash animation was reworked.
